description:
ownCloud
Living in a Cloudy Post-PRISM World and how ownCloud can help

With the potentially cloud-freezing impact of the recent NSA revelations (especially for businesses in Europe) how can users still take advantage of cloud technologies and yet still maintain reasonable security and privacy of their data? Projects like PRISM may have far-reaching implications for users of public cloud computing. Specifically, it could drive more users towards storage solutions that are hosted on own infrastructure.

This talk will discuss the problems of a future with centralized cloud file sync and share services and will present ownCloud as a possible solution.

Download video: http://videos.fscons.org/fscons/2013/c444_-_2013-11-09_1100_-_owncloud_-_frank_karlitscheck_-_50.ogv
